frontmatter.name: swCreateSectionViewAtOptions_e
frontmatter.description: Options that affect the section view that is created. Bitmask.

title: swCreateSectionViewAtOptions_e
description: Options that affect the section view that is created. Bitmask.

values.description: or 0x4; If set, then the direction of this section view is switched; if not set, then the direction of this section view is not switched
or 0x80: If set, then shows only the intersecting line of a surface in a section view
or 0x20; If set, then only the surfaces cut by the section line apear in the section view; if not set, then all model surfaces appear in the section view
or 0x40; If set, then fasteners are not included in the section view; if not set, then fasteners are included in the section view
or 0x1; If set, then the section does not snap into alignment with the parent view; if not set, then the section snaps into alignment with the parent view
or 0x2; If set, then an aligned section view is created (two lines at an angle); if not set, a normal projection section view is created
or 0x10; If set, then a partial section view is created; if not set, then a complete section view is created
or 0x8; If set, then the section view is scaled with the model; if not set, then the section view is not scaled with the model
